example.text: But the sad fact is, some folks have long wanted to privatize mail delivery to enrich themselves, and those folks worked for years to steadily run the USPS into the ground. But in the first half of the year, I joined several of my colleagues in reaching across the aisle to make critical changes through the Postal Service Reform Act.

Just hopped off the phone with Transportation [[user]]. With another busy construction season kicking off in Montana, I'm eager to make progress on the many projects that my bipartisan infrastructure law is fueling across our great state. [[url]]

It's past time we ban Members of Congress from stock trading to ensure our elected officials aren't putting their own interests before the public trust.

NEWS: I'm leading a week of action in the Senate to counter China and defend Montanans' freedom and privacy. From sending spy balloons to buying up American farmland, the CCP is working to undermine us as the world's leading superpower—and we've got to stop them in their tracks. [[url]]
